title: AI-Powered Marketing Strategy with HubSpot
description: Learn to leverage AI tools within HubSpot for lead generation, content personalization, and campaign optimization. Includes hands-on projects with ChatGPT integration and AI analytics.

title: Machine Learning for Everyone
description: Comprehensive introduction to machine learning concepts with practical applications. No coding required. Perfect for business professionals looking to understand AI impact.

title: AI Productivity Tools for Administrative Professionals
description: Master ChatGPT, Claude, and other AI tools to revolutionize administrative tasks. Includes automation workflows, document generation, and calendar management.

title: Python for AI Development
description: Learn Python programming specifically for AI and machine learning applications. Covers TensorFlow, PyTorch, and modern AI development practices.

title: AI Product Management Essentials
description: Learn to manage AI-powered products, understand ML model lifecycle, and make data-driven product decisions. Includes real-world case studies.

title: Conversational AI and Chatbot Design
description: Design and implement AI-powered chatbots and virtual assistants. Perfect for customer support and UX professionals entering the AI space.

title: AI-Driven Sales Automation and Lead Generation
description: Leverage AI tools for sales prospecting, lead scoring, and customer relationship management. Includes Salesforce AI integration.

title: AI in Financial Analysis and Risk Management
description: Apply artificial intelligence to financial modeling, fraud detection, and investment analysis. Covers fintech trends and regulatory considerations.

title: AI-Powered Recruitment and HR Analytics
description: Transform HR processes with AI tools for candidate screening, employee engagement analysis, and predictive workforce planning.

title: AI Content Creation and Creative Writing
description: Master AI tools for content creation, including GPT-4, DALL-E, and video generation. Perfect for marketers, writers, and creative professionals.

title: Advanced Prompt Engineering for Professionals
description: Learn advanced prompt engineering techniques for ChatGPT, Claude, and other LLMs. Applicable across all professional fields and roles.

title: AI Design Tools and Creative Automation
description: Integrate AI into your design workflow with Midjourney, Adobe Firefly, and other generative AI tools. Covers brand consistency and creative automation.
